Coptotermes bornensis
; key; synonymy; soldier described and figured; distribution. Indonesia : Kalimantan ; Malaysia : Sabah .
 DISTRIBUTION: Oriental Region— Indonesia : Kalimantan , Sumatra ; Malaysia : Mainland, Sabah , Sarawak ; Singapore .

paragraph.materialsCitation: TYPE DATA: Holotype : NAP soldier [no mention in the English summary of where the holotype

Coptotermes vastator Light, 1929c: 422–449
(imago, soldier, worker), figs. 1–4, pls. 1–6 [synonymized with
gestroi
by Yeap et al., 2007: 467, 469].

TYPE DATA: Syntypes : AMNH Light nos. 471 and 491 imagoes, soldiers, workers [numerous other syntypes from many other localities listed by Light, 1929: 433–438, but their whereabouts are unknown]; USNM imagoes, soldiers, workers, NCIP imago, soldier [incorrectly cited as paratypes by Ruelle, 1975b], MCZ No. 1047 imago, soldier, FRI imago, soldier, worker.
TYPE LOCALITY: Philippines : Luzon: Manila .

Coptotermes xiamensis Ahmad and Akhtar, 2002: 15
